CompassSearch.h

00001 /* CompassSearch.h 
00002  * header file for a search based on the class PatternSearch.
00003  * A compass search checks the positive and negative quardinate vectors for
00004  * each dimension until improvement in the function values is found.  
00005  * The search then relocates to the improving point and begins again.
00006  * Liz Dolan, The College of William and Mary, 1999
00007  *
00008  *                                                                 
00009  *  The author of this software is Elizabeth  D. Dolan.                     
00010  *  Permission to use, copy, modify, and distribute this software  
00011  *  for any purpose without fee is hereby granted, provided that   
00012  *  this entire notice is included in all copies of any software   
00013  *  which is or includes a copy or modification of this software   
00014  *  and in all copies of the supporting documentation for such     
00015  *  software.  THIS SOFTWARE IS BEING PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT    
00016  *  ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTY.  IN PARTICULAR, THE AUTHOR    
00017  *  OFFERS NO REPRESENTATION OR WARRANTY OF ANY KIND                   
00018  *  CONCERNING THE MERCHANTABILITY OF THIS SOFTWARE OR ITS    
00019  *  FITNESS FOR ANY PARTICULAR PURPOSE. 
00020  *
00021  *  Direct Search Version,
00022  *  Modified by Anne Shepherd, College of William and Mary,
00023  *  2001
00024  */
